name: hiddenengine
description: Hidden Engine for light node.js sites
author: Anatoly Piskunov (https://github.com/On1x)

scripts.preinstall: apt-get install openssl && mkdir ssl && openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout ./ssl/ssl.key -out ./ssl/ssl.crt -subj "/C=HE/ST=HE/L=HE/O=HE" && pm2 startup
scripts.start: pm2 restart index.js --name hiddenengine && pm2 save && pm2 monit hiddenengine
